name: Andrew Evans
bio: Andrew Evans is a Software Engineer with over 10 years of industry experience. He is a Manager at CapTech Consulting, and also works on open source software in his free time. He enjoys writing about what he learns and helping others whenever possible. When he's not coding, Andrew enjoys spending time with his wife, woodworking, reading, playing with his cats, and being outdoors. Andrew's also a huge Star Wars fan, and supports all things force-related. Andrew lives in Virginia with his wife and their 2 cats.
